question: Match the following:
columnB: Total well-being in all aspects of reproduction, i.e., physical, emotional, behavioural and social
First nation in the world to initiate various action plans at national level towards attaining a reproductively healthy society
Reproductive organs, adolescence and associated changes, safe and hygienic sexual practices, sexually transmitted infections (STIs) including AIDS
Problems like menstrual irregularities, pregnancy related aspects, delivery, medical termination of pregnancy, STIs, birth control, infertility, post natal child and maternal management

matches.Reproductive health: Total well-being in all aspects of reproduction, i.e., physical, emotional, behavioural and social

matches.India: First nation in the world to initiate various action plans at national level towards attaining a reproductively healthy society

matches.Counselling and creating awareness: Reproductive organs, adolescence and associated changes, safe and hygienic sexual practices, sexually transmitted infections (STIs) including AIDS

matches.Providing medical facilities and care: Problems like menstrual irregularities, pregnancy related aspects, delivery, medical termination of pregnancy, STIs, birth control, infertility, post natal child and maternal management

answer.Reproductive health: Total well-being in all aspects of reproduction, i.e., physical, emotional, behavioural and social
answer.India: First nation in the world to initiate various action plans at national level towards attaining a reproductively healthy society
answer.Counselling and creating awareness: Reproductive organs, adolescence and associated changes, safe and hygienic sexual practices, sexually transmitted infections (STIs) including AIDS
answer.Providing medical facilities and care: Problems like menstrual irregularities, pregnancy related aspects, delivery, medical termination of pregnancy, STIs, birth control, infertility, post natal child and maternal management

question: Match the following:
columnA: Reduced maternal and infant mortality rates
Improved health facilities and better living conditions
columnB: Indicate overall improvement in reproductive health
Promoted an explosive growth of population
Natural, traditional, barrier, IUDs, pills, injectables, implants and surgical methods
Not regular requirements for reproductive health but used to avoid pregnancy or to delay or space pregnancy

matches.Reduced maternal and infant mortality ra: Indicate overall improvement in reproductive health

matches.Improved health facilities and better li: Promoted an explosive growth of population

matches.Various contraceptive options: Natural, traditional, barrier, IUDs, pills, injectables, implants and surgical methods

matches.Contraceptives: Not regular requirements for reproductive health but used to avoid pregnancy or to delay or space pregnancy

answer.Reduced maternal and infant mortality ra: Indicate overall improvement in reproductive health
answer.Improved health facilities and better li: Promoted an explosive growth of population
answer.Various contraceptive options: Natural, traditional, barrier, IUDs, pills, injectables, implants and surgical methods
answer.Contraceptives: Not regular requirements for reproductive health but used to avoid pregnancy or to delay or space pregnancy

question: Match the following:
columnA: Simple precautions to avoid contracting STIs
columnB: Pelvic Inflammatory Diseases (PIDs), still birth, infertility
Avoiding sexual intercourse with unknown/multiple partners, use of condoms during coitus

matches.Complications of STIs: Pelvic Inflammatory Diseases (PIDs), still birth, infertility

matches.Simple precautions to avoid contracting: Avoiding sexual intercourse with unknown/multiple partners, use of condoms during coitus

answer.Complications of STIs: Pelvic Inflammatory Diseases (PIDs), still birth, infertility
answer.Simple precautions to avoid contracting: Avoiding sexual intercourse with unknown/multiple partners, use of condoms during coitus

question: Match the following:
columnB: Inability to conceive or produce children even after 2 years of unprotected sexual cohabitation
One method available to help such couples
In Vitro fertilisation followed by transfer of embryo into the female genital tract

matches.Definition of infertility: Inability to conceive or produce children even after 2 years of unprotected sexual cohabitation

matches.IVF followed by embryo transfer: One method available to help such couples

matches.Test Tube Baby Programme: In Vitro fertilisation followed by transfer of embryo into the female genital tract

answer.Definition of infertility: Inability to conceive or produce children even after 2 years of unprotected sexual cohabitation
answer.IVF followed by embryo transfer: One method available to help such couples
answer.Test Tube Baby Programme: In Vitro fertilisation followed by transfer of embryo into the female genital tract
